        wpCookies.map(function(cookieName) {

        require(["jquery", "Magento_Swatches/js/swatch-renderer"], function ($) {
            $('[data-am-js="swatch-item"]').SwatchRendererTooltip();
        });</script> <script type="text/x-magento-init">
{
    ".am-filter-items-attr_size": {
        "amShopbyFilterSwatch": {
            "collectFilters": 0        }
    }
}</script>  </div></div>      <div data-role="collapsible" class="filter-options-item"><div data-role="title" class="filter-options-title">ETICHETĂ</div><div data-role="content"     require(['jquery'], function ($) {
        var recaptcha = [],
            formsToProtect = 'form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002Fcreatepost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022newsletter\u002Fsubscriber\u002Fnew\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022review\u002Fproduct\u002Fpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022contact\u002Findex\u002Fpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002Fcreatepost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002FloginPost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002Fforgotpasswordpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002Fresetpasswordpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022newsletter\u002Fsubscriber\u002Fnew\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022contact\u002Findex\u002Fpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022review\u002Fproduct\u002Fpost\u0022\u005D';

        window.formToProtectOnPage = [];
        $.each($(formsToProtect), function (index, formToProtect) {
            window.formToProtectOnPage.push(formToProtect);
        });

        if (window.formToProtectOnPage.length) {
            var recaptchaScript = document.createElement('script');
            recaptchaScript.src = 'https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api.js?onload=amInvisibleCaptchaOnloadCallback&render=explicit&amp;hl=PL';
            recaptchaScript.attributes = 'async defer';
            document.body.appendChild(recaptchaScript);
        }

        window.amInvisibleCaptchaOnloadCallback = function () {
            for (var i = 0; i < window.formToProtectOnPage.length; i++) {
                var tokenInput = document.createElement('input');
                tokenInput.type = 'hidden';
                tokenInput.name = 'amasty_invisible_token';
                window.formToProtectOnPage[i].appendChild(tokenInput);
            }

            var id = "";
            if (id) {
                var additionalForm = document.getElementById(id).form;
                if (additionalForm) {
                    window.formToProtectOnPage.push(additionalForm);
                }
            }

            var renderCaptcha = function(event, form, id) {
                recaptcha[i] = grecaptcha.render(id, {
                    'theme': 'light',
                    'badge': 'bottomright',
                    'sitekey': '6LfE6n4UAAAAAOy6yImRZMFdAUxibADMLQ6yPm7A',
                    'callback': function(token) {
                        if ($(form).valid()) {
                            form.querySelector("[name='amasty_invisible_token']").setAttribute('value', token);
                            $(form).submit();
                        }
                        for (var j = 0; j < recaptcha.length; j++) {
                            grecaptcha.reset(recaptcha[j]);
                        }
                    }
                });
            };

            for (var i = 0; i < window.formToProtectOnPage.length; i++) {
                var form = window.formToProtectOnPage[i];
                if (form.tagName.toLowerCase() != 'form') {
                    continue;
                }

                id = form.querySelector("[type='submit']");
                if (null == id) {
                    if (form.classList.contains('amform-form')) {
                        $(window).on(form.getAttribute('id'), renderCaptcha);
                    } else {
                        console.log(
                            'Amsty Google Invisible reCaptcha: can not protect form with id = '
                            + form.id
                            + ', please remove appropriate URL and Selector in the configuration of the extension.'
                        );
                    }
                    continue;
                }

                renderCaptcha(null, form, id);
            }
        };
    });</script> <script type="text/x-magento-init">

    window.addEventListener('load', function () {
        var dataFromStorage = localStorage.getItem('_qon_request');

        function persistAsyncQuarticon(dataFromStorage) {
            var DoubleOptIn = window._QONizer.Modules.DoubleOptIn;

            DoubleOptIn.persist(JSON.parse(dataFromStorage));
            return;
        }

        if (!!dataFromStorage) {
            try {
                persistAsyncQuarticon(dataFromStorage);
            } catch (e) {
                console.error('could not persist the agreements', dataFromStorage, e);
            }

            
            localStorage.removeItem('_qon_request');
        }
    });</script>   <script>
        require(['jquery','weltpixel_persistentLayer','weltpixel_gtm'],
            function ($, wpPersDl ,wpgtm) {
                $( document ).ajaxComplete(function( event, xhr, settings ) {
                    if (settings.url.search('/customer\/section\/load/') > 0) {
                        var response = xhr.responseJSON;
                        if (response.gtm) {
                            var dataLayerData = $.parseJSON(response.gtm.datalayer);
                            for (index in dataLayerData) {
                                window.dataLayer.push(dataLayerData[index]);
                            }
                        }
                    }
                });
                var wpPersDlOptions = {'storageExpiryTime' : 30 };
                var wpGtmOptions = {
                    'enabled' : 0,
                    'persDataLayer' : wpPersDl
                };

                wpgtm.trackPromotion(wpGtmOptions);

        wpCookies.map(function(cookieName) {

            if (cookieValue) {
                var dlObject = {};

<h4 class="hidden-title">Despre noi</h4>
<div class="footer-col-content">
<div class="footer-logo">
<div class="logoAfter"></div>
</div>
<div class="desc-footer">Magazinul Distance.ro aparține companiei Distance - o rețea de saloane cu pantofi sport cu cea mai rapidă dezvoltare. Oferim o gamă de pantofi, selectată de profesioniști, produși de branduri precum Nike, New Balance, adidas, Tommy Hilfiger, Calvin Klein, Puma, Fila, Jordan Brand, Vans, Timberland, The North Face.</div>

    require(['jquery'], function ($) {
        var recaptcha = [],
            formsToProtect = 'form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002Fcreatepost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022newsletter\u002Fsubscriber\u002Fnew\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022review\u002Fproduct\u002Fpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022contact\u002Findex\u002Fpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002Fcreatepost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002FloginPost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002Fforgotpasswordpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002Fresetpasswordpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022newsletter\u002Fsubscriber\u002Fnew\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022contact\u002Findex\u002Fpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022review\u002Fproduct\u002Fpost\u0022\u005D';

        window.formToProtectOnPage = [];
        $.each($(formsToProtect), function (index, formToProtect) {
            window.formToProtectOnPage.push(formToProtect);
        });

        if (window.formToProtectOnPage.length) {
            var recaptchaScript = document.createElement('script');
            recaptchaScript.src = 'https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api.js?onload=amInvisibleCaptchaOnloadCallback&render=explicit&amp;hl=PL';
            recaptchaScript.attributes = 'async defer';
            document.body.appendChild(recaptchaScript);
        }

        window.amInvisibleCaptchaOnloadCallback = function () {
            for (var i = 0; i < window.formToProtectOnPage.length; i++) {
                var tokenInput = document.createElement('input');
                tokenInput.type = 'hidden';
                tokenInput.name = 'amasty_invisible_token';
                window.formToProtectOnPage[i].appendChild(tokenInput);
            }

            var id = "";
            if (id) {
                var additionalForm = document.getElementById(id).form;
                if (additionalForm) {
                    window.formToProtectOnPage.push(additionalForm);
                }
            }

            var renderCaptcha = function(event, form, id) {
                recaptcha[i] = grecaptcha.render(id, {
                    'theme': 'light',
                    'badge': 'bottomright',
                    'sitekey': '6LfE6n4UAAAAAOy6yImRZMFdAUxibADMLQ6yPm7A',
                    'callback': function(token) {
                        if ($(form).valid()) {
                            form.querySelector("[name='amasty_invisible_token']").setAttribute('value', token);
                            $(form).submit();
                        }
                        for (var j = 0; j < recaptcha.length; j++) {
                            grecaptcha.reset(recaptcha[j]);
                        }
                    }
                });
            };

            for (var i = 0; i < window.formToProtectOnPage.length; i++) {
                var form = window.formToProtectOnPage[i];
                if (form.tagName.toLowerCase() != 'form') {
                    continue;
                }

                id = form.querySelector("[type='submit']");
                if (null == id) {
                    if (form.classList.contains('amform-form')) {
                        $(window).on(form.getAttribute('id'), renderCaptcha);
                    } else {
                        console.log(
                            'Amsty Google Invisible reCaptcha: can not protect form with id = '
                            + form.id
                            + ', please remove appropriate URL and Selector in the configuration of the extension.'
                        );
                    }
                    continue;
                }

                renderCaptcha(null, form, id);
            }
        };
    });</script> <script type="text/x-magento-init">

    window.addEventListener('load', function () {
        var dataFromStorage = localStorage.getItem('_qon_request');

        function persistAsyncQuarticon(dataFromStorage) {
            var DoubleOptIn = window._QONizer.Modules.DoubleOptIn;

            DoubleOptIn.persist(JSON.parse(dataFromStorage));
            return;
        }

        if (!!dataFromStorage) {
            try {
                persistAsyncQuarticon(dataFromStorage);
            } catch (e) {
                console.error('could not persist the agreements', dataFromStorage, e);
            }

            
            localStorage.removeItem('_qon_request');
        }
    });</script>   <script>

         var wpCookies = ['wp_customerId','wp_customerGroup'];
        wpCookies.map(function(cookieName) {
            var cookieValue = window.getWpCookie(cookieName);
            if (cookieValue) {
                var dlObject = {};
                dlObject[cookieName.replace('wp_', '')] = cookieValue;
                window.dataLayer.push(dlObject);
            }
        });</script>

<p><span style="font-size: 9pt;">Site-ul web folosește fișierele cookie în scopuri statistice, pentru realizarea de servicii și de marketing.<br> În timp ce utilizați site-ul web, acestea vor fi salvate în memoria dispozitivului și utilizate de noi și de partenerii noștri pentru a vă prezenta anunțuri publicitare și un conținut adaptat nevoilor și preferințelor dvs. Puteți determina în mod independent condițiile pentru stocarea sau accesarea fișierelor cookie în browserul dvs. <br>Aflați mai multe în </span><a title="Politica de confidențialitate" href="/politica-de-confidentialitate" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span style="font-size: 9pt;">Politica noastră de Confidențialitate .</span></a></p>

<h4 class="hidden-title">Despre noi</h4>
<div class="footer-col-content">
<div class="footer-logo">
<div class="logoAfter"></div>
</div>
<div class="desc-footer">Magazinul Distance.ro aparține companiei Distance - o rețea de saloane cu pantofi sport cu cea mai rapidă dezvoltare. Oferim o gamă de pantofi, selectată de profesioniști, produși de branduri precum Nike, New Balance, adidas, Tommy Hilfiger, Calvin Klein, Puma, Fila, Jordan Brand, Vans, Timberland, The North Face.</div>

    require(['jquery'], function ($) {
        var recaptcha = [],
            formsToProtect = 'form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002Fcreatepost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022newsletter\u002Fsubscriber\u002Fnew\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022review\u002Fproduct\u002Fpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022contact\u002Findex\u002Fpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002Fcreatepost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002FloginPost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002Fforgotpasswordpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002Fresetpasswordpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022newsletter\u002Fsubscriber\u002Fnew\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022contact\u002Findex\u002Fpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022review\u002Fproduct\u002Fpost\u0022\u005D';

        window.formToProtectOnPage = [];
        $.each($(formsToProtect), function (index, formToProtect) {
            window.formToProtectOnPage.push(formToProtect);
        });

        if (window.formToProtectOnPage.length) {
            var recaptchaScript = document.createElement('script');
            recaptchaScript.src = 'https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api.js?onload=amInvisibleCaptchaOnloadCallback&render=explicit&amp;hl=PL';
            recaptchaScript.attributes = 'async defer';
            document.body.appendChild(recaptchaScript);
        }

        window.amInvisibleCaptchaOnloadCallback = function () {
            for (var i = 0; i < window.formToProtectOnPage.length; i++) {
                var tokenInput = document.createElement('input');
                tokenInput.type = 'hidden';
                tokenInput.name = 'amasty_invisible_token';
                window.formToProtectOnPage[i].appendChild(tokenInput);
            }

            var id = "";
            if (id) {
                var additionalForm = document.getElementById(id).form;
                if (additionalForm) {
                    window.formToProtectOnPage.push(additionalForm);
                }
            }

            var renderCaptcha = function(event, form, id) {
                recaptcha[i] = grecaptcha.render(id, {
                    'theme': 'light',
                    'badge': 'bottomright',
                    'sitekey': '6LfE6n4UAAAAAOy6yImRZMFdAUxibADMLQ6yPm7A',
                    'callback': function(token) {
                        if ($(form).valid()) {
                            form.querySelector("[name='amasty_invisible_token']").setAttribute('value', token);
                            $(form).submit();
                        }
                        for (var j = 0; j < recaptcha.length; j++) {
                            grecaptcha.reset(recaptcha[j]);
                        }
                    }
                });
            };

            for (var i = 0; i < window.formToProtectOnPage.length; i++) {
                var form = window.formToProtectOnPage[i];
                if (form.tagName.toLowerCase() != 'form') {
                    continue;
                }

                id = form.querySelector("[type='submit']");
                if (null == id) {
                    if (form.classList.contains('amform-form')) {
                        $(window).on(form.getAttribute('id'), renderCaptcha);
                    } else {
                        console.log(
                            'Amsty Google Invisible reCaptcha: can not protect form with id = '
                            + form.id
                            + ', please remove appropriate URL and Selector in the configuration of the extension.'
                        );
                    }
                    continue;
                }

                renderCaptcha(null, form, id);
            }
        };
    });</script> <script type="text/x-magento-init">
    {

            "ajaxWishlist": {"isShowSpinner":true,"isShowSuccessMessage":true,"successMessageText":"Product {product.name} has been added to your wishlist.","customerLoginUrl":"https:\/\/distance.ro\/customer\/account\/login\/"}        }

            initLazyload('.lazy');
        });

        $('body').on('contentUpdated', '#amasty-shopby-product-list', function () {
            initLazyload('.lazy');
        });

    window.addEventListener('load', function () {
        var dataFromStorage = localStorage.getItem('_qon_request');

        function persistAsyncQuarticon(dataFromStorage) {
            var DoubleOptIn = window._QONizer.Modules.DoubleOptIn;

            DoubleOptIn.persist(JSON.parse(dataFromStorage));
            return;
        }

        if (!!dataFromStorage) {
            try {
                persistAsyncQuarticon(dataFromStorage);
            } catch (e) {
                console.error('could not persist the agreements', dataFromStorage, e);
            }

            
            localStorage.removeItem('_qon_request');
        }
    });</script>   <script>
        require(['jquery','weltpixel_persistentLayer','weltpixel_gtm'],
            function ($, wpPersDl ,wpgtm) {
                $( document ).ajaxComplete(function( event, xhr, settings ) {
                    if (settings.url.search('/customer\/section\/load/') > 0) {
                        var response = xhr.responseJSON;
                        if (response.gtm) {
                            var dataLayerData = $.parseJSON(response.gtm.datalayer);
                            for (index in dataLayerData) {
                                window.dataLayer.push(dataLayerData[index]);
                            }
                        }
                    }
                });
                var wpPersDlOptions = {'storageExpiryTime' : 30 };
                var wpGtmOptions = {
                    'enabled' : 0,
                    'persDataLayer' : wpPersDl
                };
                wpPersDl.init(wpPersDlOptions);
                wpgtm.trackPromotion(wpGtmOptions);
            });</script></body></html>

         var wpCookies = ['wp_customerId','wp_customerGroup'];
        wpCookies.map(function(cookieName) {
            var cookieValue = window.getWpCookie(cookieName);
            if (cookieValue) {
                var dlObject = {};
                dlObject[cookieName.replace('wp_', '')] = cookieValue;
                window.dataLayer.push(dlObject);

<p><span style="font-size: 9pt;">Site-ul web folosește fișierele cookie în scopuri statistice, pentru realizarea de servicii și de marketing.<br> În timp ce utilizați site-ul web, acestea vor fi salvate în memoria dispozitivului și utilizate de noi și de partenerii noștri pentru a vă prezenta anunțuri publicitare și un conținut adaptat nevoilor și preferințelor dvs. Puteți determina în mod independent condițiile pentru stocarea sau accesarea fișierelor cookie în browserul dvs. <br>Aflați mai multe în </span><a title="Politica de confidențialitate" href="/politica-de-confidentialitate" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span style="font-size: 9pt;">Politica noastră de Confidențialitate .</span></a></p>

                            require(['Unity_DisplayDiscount/js/product/percentAmount', 'domReady!'], function (percentAmount) {
                                var element = document.getElementById('label_discount_603faa56eb84c');
                                var dsc = percentAmount(
                                    {
                                        priceContainer: ".price-box[data-price-box=\"product-id-217489\"]"
                                    },
                                    element
                                );

<h4 class="hidden-title">Despre noi</h4>
<div class="footer-col-content">
<div class="footer-logo">
<div class="logoAfter"></div>
</div>
<div class="desc-footer">Magazinul Distance.ro aparține companiei Distance - o rețea de saloane cu pantofi sport cu cea mai rapidă dezvoltare. Oferim o gamă de pantofi, selectată de profesioniști, produși de branduri precum Nike, New Balance, adidas, Tommy Hilfiger, Calvin Klein, Puma, Fila, Jordan Brand, Vans, Timberland, The North Face.</div>

    require(['jquery'], function ($) {
        var recaptcha = [],
            formsToProtect = 'form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002Fcreatepost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022newsletter\u002Fsubscriber\u002Fnew\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022review\u002Fproduct\u002Fpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022contact\u002Findex\u002Fpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002Fcreatepost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002FloginPost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002Fforgotpasswordpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022customer\u002Faccount\u002Fresetpasswordpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022newsletter\u002Fsubscriber\u002Fnew\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022contact\u002Findex\u002Fpost\u0022\u005D,form\u005Baction\u002A\u003D\u0022review\u002Fproduct\u002Fpost\u0022\u005D';

        window.formToProtectOnPage = [];
        $.each($(formsToProtect), function (index, formToProtect) {
            window.formToProtectOnPage.push(formToProtect);
        });

        if (window.formToProtectOnPage.length) {
            var recaptchaScript = document.createElement('script');
            recaptchaScript.src = 'https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api.js?onload=amInvisibleCaptchaOnloadCallback&render=explicit&amp;hl=PL';
            recaptchaScript.attributes = 'async defer';
            document.body.appendChild(recaptchaScript);
        }

        window.amInvisibleCaptchaOnloadCallback = function () {
            for (var i = 0; i < window.formToProtectOnPage.length; i++) {
                var tokenInput = document.createElement('input');
                tokenInput.type = 'hidden';
                tokenInput.name = 'amasty_invisible_token';
                window.formToProtectOnPage[i].appendChild(tokenInput);
            }

            var id = "";
            if (id) {
                var additionalForm = document.getElementById(id).form;
                if (additionalForm) {
                    window.formToProtectOnPage.push(additionalForm);
                }
            }

            var renderCaptcha = function(event, form, id) {
                recaptcha[i] = grecaptcha.render(id, {
                    'theme': 'light',
                    'badge': 'bottomright',
                    'sitekey': '6LfE6n4UAAAAAOy6yImRZMFdAUxibADMLQ6yPm7A',
                    'callback': function(token) {
                        if ($(form).valid()) {
                            form.querySelector("[name='amasty_invisible_token']").setAttribute('value', token);
                            $(form).submit();
                        }
                        for (var j = 0; j < recaptcha.length; j++) {
                            grecaptcha.reset(recaptcha[j]);
                        }
                    }
                });
            };

            for (var i = 0; i < window.formToProtectOnPage.length; i++) {
                var form = window.formToProtectOnPage[i];
                if (form.tagName.toLowerCase() != 'form') {
                    continue;
                }

                id = form.querySelector("[type='submit']");
                if (null == id) {
                    if (form.classList.contains('amform-form')) {
                        $(window).on(form.getAttribute('id'), renderCaptcha);
                    } else {
                        console.log(
                            'Amsty Google Invisible reCaptcha: can not protect form with id = '
                            + form.id
                            + ', please remove appropriate URL and Selector in the configuration of the extension.'
                        );
                    }
                    continue;
                }

                renderCaptcha(null, form, id);
            }
        };
    });</script> <script type="text/x-magento-init">

    require(['jquery', 'Unity_LazyLoading/js/jquery_lazyload'], function($) {

        function initLazyload(elements) {
            $(elements).lazyload({
                effect: "fadeIn",
                effectspeed: 1000,
                imageloader: "https://cdn-distance.pl/static/version1614584284/frontend/TemplateMonster/distance/ro_RO/Unity_LazyLoading/images/Loader.gif"
            });
        }

        initLazyload('img.lazy, a.lazy, div.lazy');

        $('body').on('lazyload', '.lazy', function () {
            initLazyload('.lazy');
        });

        $('body').on('contentUpdated', '#amasty-shopby-product-list', function () {
            initLazyload('.lazy');
        });
    });</script> <div id="awin"></div><script>

    require([
        'jquery'
    ], function ($) {
        'use strict';

        let miniCart = $("[data-block='minicart']");

        $(document).on('ajaxComplete',function (){
            $('.message-success a[href*="checkout/cart"]').parents('.message-success').hide();
        })

        miniCart.on('dropdowndialogopen', function () {
            $('.overlay-basket').show();
        });

        miniCart.on('dropdowndialogclose', function () {
            $('.overlay-basket').hide();

    window.addEventListener('load', function () {
        var dataFromStorage = localStorage.getItem('_qon_request');

        function persistAsyncQuarticon(dataFromStorage) {
            var DoubleOptIn = window._QONizer.Modules.DoubleOptIn;

            DoubleOptIn.persist(JSON.parse(dataFromStorage));
            return;
        }

        if (!!dataFromStorage) {
            try {
                persistAsyncQuarticon(dataFromStorage);
            } catch (e) {
                console.error('could not persist the agreements', dataFromStorage, e);
            }

            
            localStorage.removeItem('_qon_request');
        }
    });</script>   <script>
        require(['jquery','weltpixel_persistentLayer','weltpixel_gtm'],
            function ($, wpPersDl ,wpgtm) {
                $( document ).ajaxComplete(function( event, xhr, settings ) {
                    if (settings.url.search('/customer\/section\/load/') > 0) {
                        var response = xhr.responseJSON;
                        if (response.gtm) {
                            var dataLayerData = $.parseJSON(response.gtm.datalayer);
                            for (index in dataLayerData) {
                                window.dataLayer.push(dataLayerData[index]);
                            }
                        }
                    }
                });
                var wpPersDlOptions = {'storageExpiryTime' : 30 };
                var wpGtmOptions = {
                    'enabled' : 0,
                    'persDataLayer' : wpPersDl
                };
                wpPersDl.init(wpPersDlOptions);
                wpgtm.trackPromotion(wpGtmOptions);
            });</script></body></html>
